reviews.review: Whenever I feel like I need to relax with a cute little laid back game this is always my first choice.
Fun game to play with friends.

If you are looking for a game to put time to grind in, or just as casual play to have fun with friends, or even play solo. Dead by Daylight is the game for you. Dead by Daylight causes the player to use their heads and make fast decisions on the run, while keeping the player on edge when repairing a genreator or healing a fellow teammate with their difficult but fair skill check system. If you are a fan of the horror genre and love to get a quick scare once in a while, dead by daylight should be another great choice for the fellow blood and gore loving consumer!
Mucho t-bag, poner mis buebos en la cara de alguien m√°s me parece divertido. 11/10

First hour of gameplay is absolute horror. After learning the mechanics, the element of fear will dissipate, but you'll fall in love with the adrenaline rush of escaping. The experience is greatly enhanced with friends (like any game), but is still playable solo. I hear they finally have dedicated servers now, so hopefully the toxicity of the community will diminish. A great game with tons of replay ability  8/10

juego culiao malo no entiendo como la wea es tan mala aparte quien chucha tiene mas de 2000 horas en este juego.

Vengo despues de tener 2000 horas en este juego, lo unico que he aprendido es que el sida no es tan malo como parece cuando conoces este juego.

Play a killer, get accused of tryharding if you get even close to winning. Play a survivor, be accused of SWF shenanigans/genrushing for doing what you should. At some point, do those things out of pure spite.
The prophecy has been fulfilled.
Also, new Ghostface killer is pretty good. Pity they didn't get the rights for any of the characters for it, but mechanically I like the guy. Good to see the PtB had a BIG impact.
Edit: Demo Best Beast

This game when first bought is very fun. The survivors look nice and the killers look amazing, and is especially fun with friends. The community is also very nice, but there are always the cheaters and salty plebians. I will say that since there has only been 1 game mode with a few event distractions it can feel repetitive at times. As long as you can switch up builds and try out all the killers than this is a game that can keep you entertained for quite a while.
Muy buen juego, los problemas son los bugs y la comunidad que se est√° formando, pero son solucionables jaja
El juego esta muy bueno me encanta lastima que no hay mucha gente jugando se pierden un exelente juego y como no hay mucha gente tarda mucho para que se conecten 4 personas para la partida
